Superhuman | San Francisco | Polymath Engineer (Employee #2)

==About Superhuman==

We're rebuilding the email experience. Think vim/sublime for email: lightning fast, beautiful, and highly programmable — with a collection of superpowers that make you brilliant at what you do.

Why? 900M people spend 1/3 of their day reading and writing email, they deserve awesome tools.

==Team==

- Rahul Vohra, Co-Founder/CEO — founded Rapportive (YC'10, acquired by LinkedIn)

- Vivek Sodera, Co-Founder — founded Rapleaf/Liveramp (acquired for $310M)

- Me, Co-Founder/CTO — first employee at Rapportive. Built pry (used by 25% of Ruby developers)

==Stack==

React, Webpack, HTML5, IndexedDB, ServiceWorkers, Golang, Ruby, Rails, Redis, Docker, iOS/Android (nice to have)
